com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant

Class KommandantConfigurable

  • com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.KommandantConfigurable

  • public class KommandantConfigurable

    An extension of the default Kommandant aggregation which allows one to completely disable or enable a registered command, as well as including a boolean setting to enable or disable command properties being written to and read from JSON files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KommandantConfigurable(boolean enableConfigReadWrite, com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.ICommandBank cmdBank, com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.ICommandExecutor cmdExecutor, com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.ICommandParser cmdParser)
      Default constructor which uses default implementations of the registry, parser, and executor.
      KommandantConfigurable()
      Default constructor which uses default implementations of the registry, parser, and executor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addCommand(com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.command.ICommand<?> command)
      Overrided addCommand method which adds a command to the registry and additionally checks for enableConfigReadWrite value in attempt to load command properties from JSON if true. If the JSON does not exist, it will be created with the command's default properties.
      void disableCommand(com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.command.ICommand<?> command)
      Disables a command to prevent execution.
      void enableCommand(com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.command.ICommand<?> command)
      Enables a command for execution.
      boolean getEnableConfigReadWrite()
      Whether commands should have their properties loaded from and written to JSON.
      boolean loadConfig(com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.command.ICommand<?> command)
      Loads a command's JSON configuration for customized command properties.
      void saveConfig(com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.command.ICommand<?> command)
      Saves the command's current properties to JSON.
      void setEnableConfigReadWrite(boolean p)
      Whether commands should have their properties loaded from and written to JSON.

    • Method Detail

      • enableCommand

        public void enableCommand(com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.command.ICommand<?> command)

        Enables a command for execution.

        Parameters:
        command - The command to enable.

      • disableCommand

        public void disableCommand(com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.command.ICommand<?> command)

        Disables a command to prevent execution.

        Parameters:
        command - The command to disable.

      • addCommand

        public boolean addCommand(com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.command.ICommand<?> command)

        Overrided addCommand method which adds a command to the registry and additionally checks for enableConfigReadWrite value in attempt to load command properties from JSON if true. If the JSON does not exist, it will be created with the command's default properties.

        Parameters:
        command - The command to add to the registry.
        Returns:
        Boolean Whether adding the command was successful or not.

      • loadConfig

        public boolean loadConfig(com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.command.ICommand<?> command)

        Loads a command's JSON configuration for customized command properties.

        Parameters:
        command - The command to load its properties from JSON.
        Returns:
        Boolean Whether loading the custom properties was successfully completed.

      • saveConfig

        public void saveConfig(com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.command.ICommand<?> command)

        Saves the command's current properties to JSON.

        Parameters:
        command - The command to save its properties to JSON.

      • getEnableConfigReadWrite

        public boolean getEnableConfigReadWrite()

        Whether commands should have their properties loaded from and written to JSON.

      • setEnableConfigReadWrite

        public void setEnableConfigReadWrite(boolean p)

        Whether commands should have their properties loaded from and written to JSON.

        Parameters:
        p - Whether commands should have their properties loaded from and written to JSON.
